Package gw.api.util

Class TemplateUtil

java.lang.Object
gw.api.util.TemplateUtil
public class TemplateUtil extends Object
Utilities for using Gosu templates.

  • Method Details

    • renderTemplate

      @Deprecated public static String renderTemplate(String templateName, com.guidewire.pl.web.render.template.RenderTemplateValueProvider valueProvider)
      Deprecated.
      Please use a normal Gosu template and call its built in render method
      Renders a Gosu template. The template must have been registered in the appropriate WebTemplateKeys class. When this is called from another Gosu template the value provider is already available, so the call will look like: gw.api.util.TemplateUtil.renderTemplate([template name], __valueProvider).

    • getTemplate

      @Deprecated public static com.guidewire.pl.system.gosu.util.Template getTemplate(String strConfigRelativeFolder, String strTemplateName)
      Deprecated.
      Please use a normal Gosu template and call it directly
      Get/create a template tool corresponding to the specified template file residing in within the config directory.

      Basically you get a template, add symbols to it, and execute it. For example: 

         var template = libraries.Utilities.getTemplate( "templates/events", "mytemplate.gosu.xml" );
   template.addSymbol( "_city", String, "Montgomery" );
   template.addSymbol( "_state", String, "Alabama" );
   template.addSymbol( "_today", java.util.Date, new java.util.Date() );
   var strResults = template.execute();
      Parameters:
      strConfigRelativeFolder - The config relative folder e.g., "templates/events".
      strTemplateName - The file name of the template residing in the specified folder.
      Returns:
      A Template to which you add symbols and execute.

    • getValueProvider

      @Deprecated public static com.guidewire.pl.web.render.template.RenderTemplateValueProvider getValueProvider(String templateName, Object[] args)
      Deprecated.
      Please use a normal Gosu template and pass it parameters in the usual way
      Returns a value provider for rendering a Gosu template.
      Parameters:
      templateName - The name of the template which will use the value provider.
      args - The arguments expected by the value provider.
